thread.title: Vermont's Killington, Maine's Sunday River plan to open; cold spell allows for snowmaking
thread.title_full: Vermont's Killington, Maine's Sunday River plan to open; cold spell allows for snowmaking - Winnipeg Free Press

author: The Associated Press
title: Vermont's Killington, Maine's Sunday River plan to open; cold spell allows for snowmaking
text:
KILLINGTON, Vt. - The ski and snowboarding season is getting an early start in northern New England.
Vermont's Killington resort plans to be open to season pass holders and express card holders at noon on Sunday and to the public at 9 a.m. on Monday. In Maine, Sunday River also plans to open Monday.
A cold spell is allowing the resorts to make snow, which they planned to do through the weekend. Possible snow was also in the forecast in Vermont and Maine this weekend.
